ai-vb4:1.2_0: The noble truths of suffering, the origin of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering.
ai-vb4:2.1_0: What is the noble truth of suffering?
ai-vb4:2.2_0: Rebirth is suffering; old age is suffering; death is suffering; sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress are suffering; association with the disliked is suffering; separation from the liked is suffering; not getting what you wish for is suffering. In brief, the five grasping aggregates are suffering.
ai-vb4:3.2_0: The rebirth, inception, conception, reincarnation, manifestation of the aggregates, and acquisition of the sense fields of the various sentient beings in the various orders of sentient beings.
ai-vb4:4.2_0: The old age, decrepitude, broken teeth, grey hair, wrinkly skin, diminished vitality, and failing faculties of the various sentient beings in the various orders of sentient beings.
ai-vb4:5.2_0: The passing away, perishing, disintegration, demise, mortality, death, decease, breaking up of the aggregates, laying to rest of the corpse, and cutting off of the life faculty of the various sentient beings in the various orders of sentient beings.
ai-vb4:6.2_0: Loss of loss, wealth, or health. Because of sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress infatuation, falling into one of sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.
ai-vb4:6.3_0: is called ‘one who has passed away’.
ai-vb4:7.1_0: What is that kind of lamentation?
ai-vb4:7.2_0: loss of relatives, loss of property, and loss of health.
ai-vb4:8.2_0: Physical pain, physical displeasure, the painful, unpleasant feeling that’s born from physical contact.
ai-vb4:9.3_0: This is called the intention of demony.
ai-vb4:10.1_0: This is the meaning of distress?
ai-vb4:10.2_0: When they experience loss of relatives, wealth, or health.
ai-vb4:11.1_0: And what is meant by ‘association with the disliked is suffering’?
ai-vb4:11.2_0: There are sights, sounds, smells, tastes, touches, and thoughts that are unlikable, undesirable, and disagreeable.
ai-vb4:11.3_0: Heir in all manner, curses you to develop the corresponding ideas:
ai-vb4:11.4_0: “This is what is meant by ‘association with the disliked is suffering’.”
ai-vb4:12.1_0: And what is meant by ‘separation from the liked is suffering’?
ai-vb4:12.2_0: There are sights, sounds, smells, tastes, touches, and thoughts that are likable, desirable, and agreeable. And there are those who want to benefit, help, comfort, and protect you. The division from these, the disconnection, segregation, and parting from them:
ai-vb4:12.3_0: and uses them without comprehending the mind,
ai-vb4:12.4_0: “This is what is meant by ‘separation from the disliked is suffering’.”
ai-vb4:13.1_0: And what is ‘not getting what you wish for is suffering’?
ai-vb4:13.2_0: In sentient beings who are liable to be reborn, such a wish arises:
ai-vb4:13.3_0: “Oh, if only we were not liable to be reborn!
ai-vb4:14.1_0: sentient beings who are liable to grow old ...
ai-vb4:14.4_0: experience sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.
ai-vb4:14.5_0: “Oh, if only we were not liable to experience sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress!
ai-vb4:14.6_0: If only sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress would not come to us!”
ai-vb4:15.1_0: And what is meant by ‘in brief, the five grasping aggregates are suffering’?
ai-vb4:15.3_0: form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-vb4:15.4_0: “This is what is meant by ‘in brief, the five grasping aggregates are suffering’.”
ai-vb4:16.1_0: This is called the noble truth of suffering.
ai-vb4:17.1_0: What is the noble truth of the origin of suffering?
ai-vb4:17.2_0: It’s the craving that leads to future lives, mixed up with relishing and greed, taking pleasure in various different realms. That is,
ai-vb4:17.3_0: for sensual pleasures, to continue existence, and to end existence.
ai-vb4:18.1_0: But where does that craving arise and where does it settle?
ai-vb4:18.2_0: Whatever in the world seems nice and pleasant, it is there that craving arises and settles.
ai-vb4:19.1_0: And what seems nice and pleasant?
ai-vb4:19.2_0: The eye in the world seems nice and pleasant, and it is there that craving arises and settles.

ai-vb4:30.2_0: It’s the fading away and cessation of that very same craving with nothing left over; giving it away, letting it go, releasing it, and not adhering to it.

ai-vb4:43.3_0: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.

ai-vb4:51.2_0: It’s when a mendicant, quite secluded from sensual pleasures, secluded from unskillful qualities, enters and remains in the first absorption, which has the rapture and bliss born of seclusion, while placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-vb4:51.3_0: As the placing of the mind and keeping it connected are stilled, they enter and remain in the second absorption, which has the rapture and bliss born of immersion, with internal clarity and confidence, and unified mind, without placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-vb4:51.4_0: And with the fading away of rapture, they enter and remain in the third absorption, where they meditate with equanimity, mindful and aware, personally experiencing the bliss of which the noble ones declare, “Equanimous and mindful, one meditates in bliss.”
ai-vb4:51.5_0: With the giving up of pleasure and pain, and the ending of former happiness and sadness, they enter and remain in the fourth absorption, without pleasure or pain, with pure equanimity and mindfulness.
